author: degenaro
msg: UIMA-4478 DUCC Orchestrator (OR) should record requests to cancel job, reservation, or service

author: markt
msg: Make the (first) reason parameter parsing failed available as a request attribute and then use it to provide a better status code via the FailedRequstFilter (if configured).

author: jleroux
msg: A patch from Gil Portenseigne for "Add a mean to untie geo associations" https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/OFBIZ-6528
In the Webtools we can asociate Geos but we have yet no means to untie them
This patch adds a new grid in EditGeoScreen to see/delete GeoAssoc and CommonEntityLabels default-resource-name on GeoAssocType for translation purpose.
jleroux: On Pierre's Smits suggestion Gil also added a clickable link to open the associated Geo and a column to show the geoTypeId of the associated Geo.
